prisma.unknownError: Something went wrong when interacting with the database, but we're not sure what. We're looking into it.
prisma.internalError: An internal error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
prisma.uniqueConstraintViolation: A record with the same unique identifier already exists. Please check your input and try again.
prisma.foreignKeyConstraintViolation: Your operation could not be completed because a related record does not exist. Please ensure all related records are present and try again.
prisma.nullConstraintViolation: A required field is missing. Please ensure all required fields are filled out and try again.
prisma.recordNotFound: The requested record was not found. Please check the identifier and try again.
